subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: Rhonda W
full_text:

Thanks Bruce...Im still workin on the whole volume issue lol..my very first recording I wasnt able to hear myself asking anything cuz I had the box way too loud...so hopefully I'll get that volume thing fixed soon.  I have been doing the thing where I repeat something if I hear it real time.  Sometimes tho I will hear something, or think I did but then  its gone so fast that I forget to repeat what I thought I heard LOL.
   
  But so far Im loving this!
   
  Thanks,
  Rhonda

bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
          Rhonda,
 
You have taken to these sessions like a fish to water. 
Very relaxed commentary and it seems you are catching quite a few real time answers.
Two suggesstions, 1 when you hear a real time answer repeat it, it serves as conformation
that you did hear it in real time. 2 make the 470 louder the files are a bit low in volume.
 
Other than that your like an old pro.
 
bruce


  Bruce Halliday 




    
---------------------------------

Subject: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC

      
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

File : /Rhonda's Folder/lips look funny_YEP.mp3 
Uploaded by : rhondak1973 <rhondak1973@...> 
Description : Here I get an answer to my all important question---so this lipstuff make my lips look funny? YEP (I had put on some of my lifeguard white chapstick and it makes my lips bright white lol) 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Rhonda%27s%20Folder/lips%20look%20funny_YEP.mp3

Regards,

rhondak1973 <rhondak1973@...>
